original_text: And he sent young men of the people of Israel, who offered burnt offerings and sacrificed peace offerings of oxen to the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 청년들을 보내어 여호와께 소로 번제와 화목제를 드리게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he sent young men of the people of Israel
and sacrificed peace offerings of oxen to the Lord
